name: Aabahamaan Kolkata
desc: We have started our Rotaract Journey this August 2021. We are hopeful that we can bring changes through our services on different avenues.

name: Adi Bhowanipur
desc: We always wants to work as a team for our community, so we believe in One Team and our moto is "One Step Towards Changing Lives".

name: Adyashakti Kolkata
desc: Rotaract Club of Adyashakti Kolkata is an all women club and our main moto is to serve the community.

name: Altruism
desc: We, busy, technologically updated, financially accommodating, forever adapting, are so absorbed in the dynamics of our fast moving life that few of us are able to take a look, just one look at the less fortunate ones. The aim of RC Altruism is to instill a spirit of community and inspire people to lend a helping hand. View the environment with benevolence and serve the society and not just looking at it with a critical eye. Join us. Live to create innovate serve and inspire.

name: Ballygunge
meeting_venue: NK Tower,Prince Anwar Shah Road,Tollygunge, Kolkata- 700-033
desc:
As this year the district theme is based on game of thrones, like that our club also tries to be the best one to sit on the throne. 
We prefer out of the box ideas so that the needy people can get their help and the help is not concentrated on a particular area. As unity gives strength so does the members of our club to the events. We hope this rota year we emerge as a successful rotaract club.

name: Ballygunge Greens
desc:
"Small opportunities are often the beginning of great enterprises."
RC Ballygunge Greens has commenced on a new journey to work together towards a difference to create a impact on the society. We are exhilarated to announce the Rota theme of the year: 2021-22
 "Pioneer the change you envision."
We plan to implement new ideas which will bring about the changes we want to see in the society. We hope all of us work together to undertake new endeavours which will help us to work towards the change.

name: Barasat Central
desc:
This Rota Year 2021-2022, Rotaract Club of Barasat Central has decided the following theme: CHANGE FOR BETTER TOMORROW
The main ideology behind initiating such a futuristic theme is we want our present leader's work to get highlighted in the future as well. We aspire to leave a mark that the future leaders can follow and provide a change for the betterment of their own self as well as the society.
The most important asset of our club are the members, who provide their valuable ideas to bring a change in the society. For all of us here Rotaract is an extended family. We rise together, we face hardships together!
We have planned to bring change in the society by focusing on prime issues regarding women empowerment, children's education, proper sanitation, food, and clothing. As the world is going through a tough pandemic situation, being out in the open and helping the needy is quite a challenge now. Our present leader believes in facing all the hardships and providing maximum help to as many individuals as possible. As we believe no matter the problem we must come up with a solution.
Our club has also been known for organizing unique and versatile flagship events with each having a different moto.We have Rakhi with Men in Khaki as a gesture of respect towards the protectors of the society.Then we have Shyama Arghya where we celebrate the auspicious festival of Diwali and expand our friendship and bond. Then we have Pro Soccer where we provide a platform for the footballers to showcase their talent. Then we have Lunch Box where we spread love by feeding the needy on Valentine's day and lastly we have Ek-sathe Baishakh where we celebrate Bengali New Year with all our fellow Rotaractors. 

All these special events show our versatility and uniqueness for making our society a better and uplifted place to live in. This makes us different from the rest.

name: Barasat Wings
desc: we are from rotaract club  of baratwings club. Here u try to make everything possibale to serve the community.

name: Barrackpore
desc: Growth through change. - we strive towards a  change in the individual which helps them to be successful in life as change is the only constant thing in life

name: Basanti Devi College
desc: As an institute based Rotaract Club, we all are keen to serve the community and try to help them giving our bests!! New ideas, creative thoughts and young minds are always our inspiration!

name: Bidhannagar
desc: We represent solidarity and deeply sympathize with children with disabilities. We want to serve the society, help our community see a better tomorrow.

name: Budge Budge
desc: We are a club of young people from different cultures, religions, areas. We mainly focus on community service projects. Our Mission is To Serve Humanity. Themes of few major projects which we did are - clothes distribution drive, food donation drive, plantation, visiting orphanages and interaction with special children.

name: Calcutta
desc:
In the RI District 3291 which spans the geographical expanse of 12 revenue districts of South Bengal and Andaman and Nicobar Islands,Rotaract Club of Calcutta is the oldest running Rotaract Club.Since it's inception in 1969,the club has been working toward social causes ranging from spreading awareness against social evils, diseases to helping out orphanages.The club has carried out projects and events on various avenues like Food Vegas (the biggest potluck in the city) , Resolute (Celebrating World Rotaract Week with over 500+ Service based projects), Angshan ( Grocery and Ration donation to the deprived community during the natural disasters) , Anything Can Happen (Based on professional development activities of Youth),Street Santa (Distributing food packets to the kids in park Street on the eve of Christmas) and many more which stood as an innovative and excellent opportunity to involve various skills and serving the community as much as possible.

Rotaract Club of Calcutta aims to create the leaders of tomorrow.It enables Rotaractors to grow personally and professionally, address community needs, and promote international understanding through friendship and service.

Everyday, every second, Rotaract Club of Calcutta looks forward in doing  justice to its long-drawn theme of
 "Be the Better You".

name: Calcutta Avyanna
desc: We are a group of individuals who want to bring "A CHANGE WITHIN" ourselves. Once you are inducted into the RAC Calcutta Avyanna you are a part of a family. Taking the opportunity that Rotaract provides us with, we are here to provide a platform for young enthusiastic progressive individuals to bring about a change.

name: Calcutta Corporates
meeting_venue: Anahita Complex, Action Area 2B, New Town, Kolkata- 700135
desc: Idea behind opening Rotaract Club of Calcutta Corporates is to bring corporate people under one umbrella to Serve Beyond Digital Lives

name: Calcutta Cosmopolitan Genesis
desc: Rotaract is all about a sea full of opportunities and we believe in creating such opportunities to bring the change in the society

name: Calcutta Endeavour
desc:
Rotaract Club of Calcutta Endeavour believes in creating the space for holistic growth and building leaders for tomorrow.
#ChanceToChange is the driving force of the Rotaract Year 2021-2022.
Rotaract Club of Calcutta Endeavour Team has come together to embark on a journey to turn the 'C' in CHANCE to 'G' as CHANGE! 
Teamwork is our fuel to bring the change we have envisioned this year.
We aim to have a year of changing lives reflecting every chance to serve communities.

name: Calcutta Kankurgachi
desc:
Rotaract Club of Calcutta Kankurgachi, a club that has it's member from the corners of Kolkata. 3 years ago, a group of young and enthusiastic adults set out on a journey under a great leadership, with no knowledge of what Rotaract is, but with the hope to help someone, for the welfare of our society and have a little fun. 
These individuals have a lot of potential, creativity and hope in them to try and better this world, with whatever they can and however they can. Days passed and the leadership was handed down to those who worked on elevating our intent. 
Theme says "Elevate The Intent" which speaks for itself. We wish to work towards our goal, uplift our motive, motivate the youth around us and spread the word. Our intent to improve is constant.
To witness the growth has been a wonderful experience; we aim to achieve a high to balance for the lows, while making memories together.

name: Calcutta Laban Hrad
desc:
Rotaract club of Calcutta Labanhrad is a nonprofit organization which was officially chartered on 17th July ,2018. Rotaract club of Calcutta Labanhrad is a small part of one of the biggest organizations which¬† provide humanitarian service, encourage high ethical standards in all vocations and help build goodwill and peace in the societyüí´. It provides a platform to empower communities and inspire young generations to make a change in the society through various club services, community services, professional development etc.¬†
Rotaract club of Calcutta Labanhrad have played an important role in the education of children.Our main motto is to make everyone socially aware and well educated in order to be able to keep up with current events, communicate effectively, and understand the issues that are shaping our world and to achieve success in their life. üíõ
We have organized many phenomenal events and will continue organizing such events focusing on social work and try to enable people to achieve the best possible levels of personal and social well-being and make a better society.

name: Calcutta Lansdowne
desc: We try to educate the underprivileged children and distribute the vocational goods in their needs.

name: Calcutta Legacy
desc: The guiding principles of our club have been the foundation upon which our values and tradition stand. The Four-Way Test, Object of Rotary, and the Avenues of Service express our commitment to service, fellowship, diversity, integrity, and leadership. We stand united and we stand strong every day to be able to do our part for the community and as far our club bulletin is concerned which is ‚ÄòJIJIVISHA‚Äô, every member of our club has that intense desire to get the most out of every day.

name: Calcutta Majestic
desc: Rotaract Club of Calcutta Majestic is a Community Service Club which serves the needs of our community. The cornerstone of the community service Club is service leadership, which is a concept of leading by example and empowering others to achieve their full potential. The club encourages an atmosphere of teamwork in which every voice counts , engages group members into effective communication methods, and challenges its members to examine their skills and discover their leadership talents.

name: Calcutta Merlin
desc: The theme of our club is "Donate to change the world". That means we are focusing on women empowerment and hunger free India.

name: Calcutta Metro City
desc:
Rotaract Club of Calcutta Metro City works on the demand of the situation. RC CMC has a flagship project named Lift & Smash. We maintain a quote, Don't follow the trend .. Do something, which itself becomes a trend. 
# be the best for the society

name: Calcutta Metro City Mavericks
desc: Our club was chartered in December 2020 but then nothing much was done so this Rota year we started afresh with some new bunch of members. As they are very new to this movement our goal is to make them understand the essence of this movement and grow the fellowship. Also the moto of this year is to make this club stand in a position and reach the maximum of the people by contributing our part to the society and help to make this world a better place with little how we can.

name: Calcutta Metro East
meeting_venue: 150/2, Kabi Nabin Sen Road, Kajipara, Dumdum, Kolkata - 700028
desc: Rotaract Club of Calcutta Metro East aims to create the leaders of tomorrow. RC Calcutta Metro East enables Rotaractors to grow personally and professionally, address community needs, and promote international understanding through friendship and service. RCCME, since its charter in 1990 has been one of the most Prominent and Eminent clubs of the R. I. District 3291 which covers the geographical border of eleven revenue districts of South Bengal and The Andamans. Throughout the year the energetic and hardworking bunch of Rotaractors carry out exemplary projects such as "BE PAWSITIVE" - an initiative to feed stray dogs, "YOUNG CHAMPS" - organising a Cultural Programme, providing food, stationery items, and all the necessities for kids at a NGO, "‡§µ‡§®‡•Ä‡§ï‡§∞‡§£" - tree plantation drive across the fields of Kolkata, "WINTER CARNIVAL" - online event to showcase individual talents, ‚ÄúEXUBERANCE‚Äù - annual sports competition, ‚ÄúE-SPORTS‚Äù - online gaming competition, ‚Äú‡§∂‡§øKSHA‚Äù - online webinar to educate children, etc.

name: Calcutta Metro South
meeting_venue: Gmeet/ jogesh Chandra chaudhuri law college
desc: Be a part of the change.  We are inviting our fellow mates to be a part of the change which we are  imparting in the society

name: Calcutta Mid Town
desc: Midtown believes in ''espirit-de-copse" and work for the betterment of the society. Along with working for betterment of society, the club provides support to the members of the club and fellow rotaractors for their personal and professional development.

name: Calcutta North East
desc: With the motto of 'Forging Tomorrows Together', our club, RC Calcutta North East has wholeheartedly served the ones in need. In the future, we promise to stand by our motto and uphold our values in order to 'Be the change'.

name: Calcutta North Suburban
meeting_venue: 194 G.T. Road, Model Apartment. Belur Math Howrah - 711202
desc: In the Heat of Covid 19 Pandemic, we the Rotaractors of Rotaract Club of Calcutta North Suburban surfaced and fabricated the genesis of this club. We forged our pillars with Focus, Commitment, Sustainability, and Unity to uphold each other and our society to make this world a better place to live in.

name: Calcutta North West
desc: The only idea is to bring about a change in a way that has never happened before and the one liner that represents our club is to *work for the society for their benefit and get us our inner satisfaction*

name: Calcutta Park Point
desc:
What makes RC Calcutta Park Point different is the strong bond all of us share with each other. It‚Äôs the spirit to work as one. We consider the ideas and opinions and respect the suggestions put in by every single individual in the club. We are going through a global pandemic that has made it difficult for everyone to step out and work for our community. But the club has made great efforts to contribute to the welfare of society and made every possible event successful through the digital medium. When the world had stopped working during this pandemic, we ROTARACTORS were working day and night to contribute to our community by all means possible. 

None of these would have been possible without our hard-working and inspiring President and our enthusiastic team who are the backbone of our club. Here, we are a family. We appreciate each other in the works they do and being young enthusiasts, we try to grow together with our hard work and efforts. Every single member is given some responsibilities and has an integral role to play so that one has an idea of how the team-building and leadership skills work and can be enhanced which they can later put forward in their professional lives. Everyone is given opportunities to explore the Rotaract journey in their own way so that they can understand the perspective of the global organization at large. Our club has tried to improve every corner of the community. We build trust, commitment, honesty, and understanding in ourselves since these are the key features that make a team ‚ÄúA TEAM‚Äù. 

We are trying to turn dreams into reality by working for the betterment of society by putting our small efforts and changes. Our aim is to rejoice in our fellowship in the true spirit and bring great success to our club and make this world a better place to live in.
Lastly, once Henry Ford said, "Coming together is a beginning, staying together is progress, and working together is success".

name: Calcutta Presidency
meeting_venue: 2/252, Sree Colony, PO Regent Estate, Kolkata-700092
desc: Chartered in July 2016, Rotaract Club of Calcutta Presidency has gone through a mesmerizing journey in Rotaract District 3291, colored with numerous events, friendships, memories and accolades. As a continuation of our legacy, this year we are focused on providing dedicated thrust on Community Service, while also indulging in the other three avenues of Rotaract in tandem, with utmost passion and enthusiasm. We aspire to outshine our past achievements and look forward to be the symbol of change.

name: Calcutta Presidency Sahaayam
desc: Our club is focused towards community and academic based activities.

name: Calcutta Renaissance
desc: Rotaract Club of Calcutta Renaissance is the only club in the district to get chartered in the WORLD ROTARACT DAY. We marked our revival in the year 2020 and from then we are looking forward to achieve new heights. We have a dedicated team of less than 20 members. Our theme this year is  "Change for a better tomorrow ". Our aim this year is membership growth, community service and brand Rotaract. Projects like RAAHAT, Chaak De Kabaddi, Upohaar  have been our outstanding projects in past year, we look forward to execute some great projects this year as well. This year is the year of Change and when there is a change their is always Renaissance.

name: Calcutta Samaritans
meeting_venue: Rabindranath Thakur Road, 153, Diamond Harbour Rd, Mukund Das Colony, Thakurpukur, Kolkata, West Bengal 700063
desc:
We the members of Rotaract Club of Calcutta Samaritans stand true to the very slogan of Rotary that is ‚ÄòServe to change lives‚Äô. 
Its only been a year since the club has been installed and within this  short period of time we have picked quite a pace by hosting numerous social service events mainly focusing on Community related services along with that we hosted multiple online competitions. But this year the club plans to focus and stress on professional development events, career counseling and career development programs but providing an overall growth and value related plans that one can peruse to boost one‚Äôs career.
The club further plans to spread its wings by developing its connections with international clubs to muster fellowship programs and create a network chain to promote each others ideologies and events.

name: Calcutta South Extension
desc:
Rotaract Club of Calcutta South Extension is run by a group of Engineering students, who came together with the common vision to work for the community, serve to the important needs and issues around us. 
The loving and affectionate outlook that we foster among us has been making our journey through social causes and upliftment especially easy. It's been a constant cycle of seniors imparting their knowledge to the juniors and juniors perfecting the projects with their wit and creativity. All of our Projects echo the unanimous vibe, "Fellowship Through Service."
We have come up with innovative projects from time to time. From building a library at an underprivileged school, making animal shelters, relief work, food and clothes donation drives throughout the lockdown etc. to organising organ donation campaign and LGBTQ awareness campaigns. Those are a few of the projects in the recent times. We have worked hard and diligently to come up with important and unique projects, to contribute to however little of a betterment we can bring to our society. 
For the Rota Year 2021-22, we have planned a great year of ideas and events, that are needful in the hour. With all hands to deck, the club aims to grow and touch higher goals. Positivity and productivity in each member, is going to act as fuel. 
#BeTheChange

name: Calcutta South West
desc: Together we can, together shall

name: Calcutta Spurs
desc:
Rotaract Club of Calcutta Spurs is a non profitable organization run by a group a of friends in RI District 3291. 
It was initiated with a motive to serve the community and do something for the greater good along with enhancing self growth and provide opportunities for the future. We strive to move forward with a positive attitude and thus, the club's moto remains "Difficulties creates Opportunities".
Involving ourselves in various activities from social to cultural, including our flagship cultural event "Elysium", we have created our mark in just a span of one year and are continuing to reach greater heights. 
Starting with a few members, now our club is ever-growing and we hope to nurture this never ending spur of talent and dedication present in each member of the club. Working as a team and outgrowing ourselves, step by step, is our way to prosperity .

name: Calcutta Sutanuti
desc:
"Hope rises like a phoenix,
from the ashes of shattered
dreams."
We,in Rotaract club of
Calcutta Sutanuti,aim at
being the ray of hope to the
ones who still wish to dream
despite their adverse
circumstances.We show them
the path to triumph over
their unquenched dreams.We
are the Phoenix of the Future.Rotaract Club of Calcutta Sutanuti and its members always believe in taking action through 
service.

name: Calcutta Universe
meeting_venue: 21F Prince Baktiar Shah Road. Tollygunge. Kolkata - 700033
desc: When you unify like minded people, you have power. Our nascent but growing family, Rotaract Club of Calcutta Universe  is a brainchild of such youth who dreamt about bringing change and actively put a foot forward. Like a moth to a flame, we have grown into a family with diverse outlooks, capabilities, resources and a unified interest to make an impact, to give back. We celebrate and cherish our uniqueness which creates a beautiful amalgamation of sorts.

name: Calcutta Visionaries
meeting_venue: virtual and a flat in vip bazar
desc: act with integrity, serve with love, work for a change

name: Calcutta West Ridge
desc: As a club RC West Ridge wants to serve the community and do its best to make it a lot better than before and in between evrything we are squeezing in some projects and a lot of prospective projects are also at hand. Team RC_CWR is always on call of action and passionately stays responsible for everyone .

name: Calcutta Yuvis
desc:
We work as a family balancing work and friendly relations. Theres no superiority but rather good bonding and a friendly work environment.
We believe in, "Together We Grow."

name: Central Calcutta
desc: Through friendship, fellowship & service we at Rotaract Club of Central Calcutta have been touching lives & effecting change since 2015. We hoped and with intensity, integrity & intelligence, we rose to the occasion & achieved our aspiration to brighten the world a little bit more. We hope through our compassionate contributions,we are able to bring a change that has an everlasting effect on society as we journey through Rotary Year 2021-22. Together, let's unlock magic with the key of kindness.

name: Central Calcutta Youth
desc: We at Rotaract Club of Central Calcutta Youth believe in Prateek Prayas And Parivartan which is to be a symbol of Effort and change , our club focuses on efforts which can bring about sustainable changes in the society. We equally wish to develop the skills of each and every member providing equal opportunities and platform to all.

name: Contemporary Kolkatans
desc: As the DRR'S themes goes "Be The Change", we too believe in Evolution and Development. Our prime motive is to create an atmosphere for ourselves to step out of our shells and bring in change within ourselves as well as the society for betterment.

name: Dumdum Metropolitan
desc:

name: East Calcutta
meeting_venue: Rotary Bhawan, 5/6, Hem Chandra Naskar Road, Kolkata-700010
desc: Our Club was revived on 25th February 2016 and the only Rotaract Club to recieve Rotary International Outstanding Award in Eastern India.

name: East Calcutta Township
desc: We are a group of graduate students,are trying to serve a community work besides our own career,to make a difference.

name: East Calcutta Wetlands
meeting_venue: Deshbandhu College For Girls, Rash Behari Avenue, 45/C, Satish Mukherjee Rd, Kalighat, Kolkata, West Bengal 700026
desc:
We are Ritaract Club of East Calcutta Wetlands.
We were formed on 18th December 2020 with the help of Rtr. Shayan Dutta. Our values are based on social work as it is the what we admire most about any social worker. With honesty and integrity we do our work.

name: Geetanjali Kolkata
desc: We, in our mission, aspire to tear down the fake barriers in society, which should not separate us from one another. Striving for all-around development of the society and also our own Members, in terms of education, healthcare and a useful mind, we direct our efforts always as a Team, to express our Virtue of Cooperation.As Tagore had coined, ‚ÄúWhere the Mind is Without Fear and the Head is Held High‚Äù,we always look forward to work together proudly as a Family for a Better and Happier Tomorrow.

name: George College
desc: Our club main focus is to help the community, providing  all kinds of nutritional food to the rural area kids that we did through our event Nutrio-1 which we will do every month. And in rural areas we are helping the women by providing them some training courses so that they can earn money for their living and also providing them educational class because most of the women in village areas are illiterate . Through out event Hathe Khori which is going to happen in the first week of September 2021, through which we will provide all types of Stationary items to 100+ kids of the age group 3 to 12 and weekly educational class and other activities so that they can pursue their dreams . And many more event on the list .

name: George School of Law
desc: We, Rotaractors from Rotaract club of George School of Law have started our club since 13th March 2019. Since from the very beginning Rotaract club of GSL has done a few projects based on community services like food donation drive , tree plantation drive and many more . We have also successfully organised some club service events like Chak De GSL, Lamp lighters , and also some events related to professional development as well. In upcoming days we are also having some plans regarding social welfare & upliftment of common people

name: Government College of Engineering and Ceramic Technology
bulletin: Rotaract Club of Government College of Engineering and Ceramic Technology
desc: Community Service lies at the heart of everything we do. We work for the betterment of our society through various kind of activities, raising funds, donations, and much more. We believe in taking small steps to being the reason for someone else's smile.

name: Government College of Engineering and Leather Technology, Kolkata
desc: we want to help people

name: Heritage Institute of Technology
desc:
Theme: LET YOUR WINGS TRANSCEND HORIZONS 
Motto: ADAPT.IMPROVE.EXCEL.

With the post pandemic life becoming our new normal, we all are trying to adapt in various ways to sustain our lifestyle. With the 12th year of the club rising beyond all barriers amidst the pandemic, the 13th year will look forward to adapt in these new normal ways and improve our service towards the community . We dreamt, trusted and achieved success in giving wings to our dreams, believing in a better tomorrow. And that belief will guide us in transcending our wings beyond horizon .

Pegasus is a mythical winged divine horse in Greek mythology that symbolises strength and healing . As we step into the post pandemic lifestyle, we aim at healing people's minds and empower them with new hope and strength. Our logo symbolises courage for better days and a spirit of bravery and energy to take in all new challenges that will come on our way . Our motto for the term is to improve the previous ways along with adapting new ones to excel in our service towards the community and giving wings to our dreams.

name: Howrah Avyanna
desc:
Rotaract Club of Howrah Avyanna by it's work tries to bring a change in the society and serve to change lives of people surrounding us. We believe in unity of selves and working with utmost integrity.
Aiming towards a better tomorrow.‚ú®‚ù§Ô∏è

name: ILEAD
desc:
Our club is a service organization, dedicating its time and resources to helping those in need. All our club members are dedicated towards the upliftment of the society and doing as much as they can. We try to make the best use of limited resources we have to some up with drives, events and programmes for fulfilling our goals.
The Motto ‚ÄúService Through Fellowship‚Äù, encourages members to not only be a part of something, but to foster lasting relationships throughout one‚Äôs time as a member in the club and beyond.

name: Jadavpur
desc: upholding the culture and heritage of our city Kolkata. Engaging with and empowering communities, promoting green actions to fight climate change.

name: Jadavpur Greens
desc: Rotaract club of Jadavpur Green's as this is our very first year of being properly active our main goal is to help the underprivileged people at large to bring smile on their faces and to do our bit and work upon the areas where people really need our help and planning programmes for mental health and proper wellbeing of the teenages and adults. Our main aim is to bring up a positive society where we have more positivity and fulfillment  we also aim to work upon things which are the need of the hour and support people for the betterment. Betterment of the society is our main goal be it any form and to bring broad smile to the faces of the people. And we believe to see the change be the change. And our club is going to bring that change on the people and create a healthy growth both on personal level and societal level.

name: Joka
desc:
The Rotaract Club of Joka, RID- 3291, grows in terms of visibility, resources, and event management capabilities.

Among the most significant undertakings by RC Joka was the covid-relief initiative Yogakshema, reaching over individual beneficiaries through crowdfunding and resource-mapping.

Today, the team is driven by its zeal to work and weaponise the maximum positive impact on society.

To accomplish these goals, the club has adopted the theme "Celebrating Inclusivity" for RY 2021-22.

name: Kolkata Krishti
desc: We are a team of enthusiastic people endeavoring to showcase the true meaning of culture infront of the world.

name: Konnagar
desc: Rotaract Club of Konnagar aims to lend a hand to people in need and is looking forward to do amazing projects without limiting their boundaries.We encourage young leaders to know and grow their leadership skills. Our motto is to set an example of quality over quantity by our work.

name: Lake Town Conquerors
desc: At RCLC we like to help out out society as much as we can , be it through community service or fun cultural events.

name: Liluah
desc: Rotaract Club of Liluah believe in Service through fellowship where we are working together for building a better and a stronger society. This year our club helped families suffering from COVID-19 provided them homemade food untill they recovered.

name: MCKV Institute of Engineering
desc: Our Theme for Rota Year 2021-2022 is Inspire to Change. We inspire our fellow rotaractors to be the change and make a little change for the society

name: Meghnad Saha Institute of Technology
desc: The Rotaract Club of Meghnad Saha Institute of Technology was chartered on the 6th of May, 2014. Since then it has been a warehouse of innovative ideas with around a hundred members, each year, putting up smiles on faces of the ones in need. Sponsored by the Rotary Club of Calcutta Mayfair, the club strongly believes in service above self. It is an organization for the youth who want to bring a change in the society. 7 amazing years since the Charter Ceremony, we stand at a place that speaks for itself about our work. This road has not been even always but through smiles and occasional hardships, we always manage to make our dreams work their way into reality. Rotaract Club of MSIT has always held a special place in the hearts of it's members. RCMSIT is not a club, it's a family of great minds and generous hearts.

name: Netaji Subhash Engineering College
desc:
Summary of Theme:- 
Develop Leadership, Professional skills and Have fun through service. 
Values:-
Club Service focuses on making clubs strong. 
Ideas:-
Club service, Professional Development Service, Community Service, International Service.

name: North Calcutta
meeting_venue: 14F/1R, Dum Dum Road Flat 3A Kolkata WB 700030 India
desc: The theme of Rotaract Club of North Calcutta for the Rota Year 2021-22 is Be The Face of Change.

name: NSHM Knowledge Campus Kolkata
desc: Our club theme for RY 2021-22 is Versatility in Unity. Our Motto is From great to greater we stand together.

name: Purulia Central
desc:
Opportunity amidst chaos
COVID19 was a big lesson for all the mankind...
But now we have to move up and forward with all the precautions and equip ourselves for the future with a fresh start...
For Rotaract Club of Purulia Central, this year is all about new beginnings. New beginnings to make things right and make things better. Heading back to work may feel like chaos, but try not to look at it that way. We now have the advantage of having taken a step back, so we can now approach your work with a fresh perspective. Look at this as an opportunity to improve systems and processes and build a stronger team.

name: RCCIIT
desc:
"Manifest Change"
The only way to enrich life is to embrace change and manifest it into society. We, at the Rotaract Club of RCCIIT, aim to tackle current and relevant topics in our community and provide our members with valuable experience and skills to push themselves and humankind to new heights.

name: Salt Lake Down Town
desc: In today's times, what this world lacks and needs the most is kindness. No act of kindness is too small or futile. Every service matters. Our club, comprising of young, budding minds, have come together to extend our unconditional support to the society through acts of kindness. Through our endeavors, our club's moto will be upheld, that is, to bring about a change in the society for a better future. To change the system, we have to be a functioning part of the system.

name: Salt Lake Metropolitan
desc: Rotaract Club of Salt Lake Metropolitan has decided under the guidance of it's president to follow the theme "Change Starts with You" getting aligned with the theme of the district RID 3291, "‡¶§‡ßÅ‡¶Æ‡¶ø‡¶á ‡¶™‡¶∞‡¶ø‡¶¨‡¶∞‡ßç‡¶§‡¶®", for the Rota year 2021- 2022. We believe that if we continue our work in uplifting the community and help people in need along with upskilling ourselves in this process, the change is inevitable.

name: Saltlake Midtown
meeting_venue: AE 122, Kalikadevi Apartment 2, Rabindrapally, Krishnapur, Kolkata- 101.
desc: Our club aspires to make Tomorrow brighter for the society and mankind. We believe in teamwork and perseverance.

name: Serampore
desc: As the Phoinex rises from its ashes , we have this years theme to rise from our virtues and lead the change by providing opportunities for people to enhance the knowledge and skills that will assist them in social needs of their communities, to help the people during major crisis.

name: Shellac City
desc: We are an organization that helps the differently able individuals realize their hopes, dreams, and ambitions and help those who need just a little extra support.Our aim is to create an inclusive society, where poor people are accepted into the mainstream economy and social life. We believe that every single person is special and talented and is just looking for a chance to excel.

name: Sheoraphuli
desc: Striving towards making a positive change in the society through collective efforts.

name: Shyamnagar
desc: Our club aims at engaging in projects regarding welfare of people and animals.Our club takes active interest in civic and moral welfareof society and also provides its members with the scope of self development

name: Sonargaon Kolkata
meeting_venue: 22/121 Raja Manindra Road, Dutta Bagan, Kolkata - 700037, West Bengal, India
desc:
Rotaract Club of Sonargaon Kolkata aims to bring today's generation together and work for a better future. 
We enable Rotaractors to grow personally and professionally, address community needs, and promote international understanding through friendship and service.

name: Surya Shikha
desc: To serve for the community

name: Tollygunge
desc: The club was formed in 2017 with the sole motto of promoting Youth for Service. Throughout the span of last 4 years, the club has grown into a vibrant one touching hundreds of lives every year. This year is a year of change, and we aim to bring about the change through services to the society.

name: Tollygunge Extension
desc: Voice of youth is Voice of change

name: Tollygunge Yuva
desc: *Cholo Paltai* means to bring a change. Our change means the change in our Social Backdrop. We have always known that the children and the women are the most vulnerable and Weeker section of the society and has been looked down upon as the most deprived section so we will together bring a change in this ideology and stand beside them to uphold the integrity of these weeker sections. With the advancement of time , laws and by laws had been amended to bring equality but still the reality in true sense differs a lot. We will give our best to bring the change at its best and also to make better a life for them through our community service, legal aid service and such other services which is within our purpoted jurisdiction. Bringing a change isn't an easy task but if we work hard with our will and dedication it's not very difficult too, rather a true will is needed to change the barriers and the mindset. With our efforts we will try to bring a change. RC Tollygunge Yuva, a group of Young Rotaractors with full of energy and dedication shall bring a change for the good of the people.

name: University of Engineering & Management, Kolkata
desc:
The Rotaract Club of University of Engineering & Management, Kolkata looks after the social well being of our surroundings. We tend to help the people who are in need. We provide an opportunity to the members of the club to enhance knowledge and skills which eventually contributes to their personal development. Various social projects helps to spread harmony, sense of responsibility, discipline, and team work spirit among the members. It also helps the members to create bonds among themselves and as a result help them to socialise. Till date we've organised a few events, namely, sapling plantation, COVID vaccination campaign for teachers, staffs, and the students. The University Club also provided ration to the needy during the pandemic. There was also an orphanage visit during the pre-COVID scenario. It brings an opportunity for the college students to exchange ideas¬† in the community, develop leadership and professional skills, and gain confidence through their work. Our Club represents the ideas of the younger generation which are colourful, innovative yet practical.

In a nutshell, RCUEMK helps in overall growth of a person in a very healthy way.

name: Uttarpara
desc: Helping and being there for those who needs. Escaping ordinary in every way to make lives better.

name: Uttarpara Heritage
desc: A club driven by a perspective and goals towards making a better place  for the society.

name: Rishra
desc:
Rotaract Club of Rishra is a non-governmental organisation and youth wing of Rotary Club of Serampore.  Rotaract Club of Rishra's Objective is :
* Service to the society
* Personality Development of its Members.

name: Calcutta Renaissance Pride
desc: We, at Rotaract Club of Calcutta Renaissance Pride, promise to make an endeavour in spreading a wave of goodness and positivity in the community that we serve, through our honest and humble efforts. Being a freshly formed club, we are a bunch of enthusiastic individuals passionate about the work we wish to do, focusing majorly on community service and fellowship events. The march has begun and we are set towards orchestrating a brighter tomorrow.

name: Calcutta Diamond
desc: Our Rotaract Club Of Calcutta Diamond brings people together irrespective of their ages for community service. Here we all exchange our ideas with our community leaders which helps us to develop our leadership and professional skills and have fun through service. New friendship and bondings are also established. We decide how to run our clubs and manage our own funds through monthly subscription from the members for executing our service projects. We also go for sponsorships. Our club holds conferences and assemblies that provides us with entertainment along with education and service. We organize various events and functions twice or thrice a month through which we help the orphanages, old age homes, children of slums and others. Plantation Drives were also held. We work for "Women Empowerment" too by promoting sense of self-worth and their ability to determine their own choices. Here we say: "Giving and helping others without a single expectation of getting back anything in return is our biggest satisfaction." ‚ù§Ô∏èü§ùüèª

name: Calcutta Millenium
desc: A group of youngsters on a mission to bring a revolution in society.

name: Calcutta South Central
desc: The main activity in Rotaract is development of youth revolving around organising service projects and humanitarian aid projects to make a worthwhile contribution for the underprivileged, organising seminars and workshops to aid professional development and to promote international peace and understanding through its various projects aimed towards a better and cheerful tomorrow and a better and progressive quality of life.

name: Calcutta Metropolitan
desc: Rotaract Club of Calcutta Metropolitan gives you the opportunity to express yourself and unearth the potential within you, while helping do your bit for the society. We mainly focus on personal development through community service and professional development events. It also includes hosting of our 10 year old flagship event during Durga Puja at Shantieer , Subhashgram where we celebrate durga puja for the elderly and less fortunate people to give them happiness, love and respect that they deserve. We also host an event in Save the Orphans Orphanage every month since 2020, to supply monthly ration and food commodities to them during the tough times of covid.

name: Garden Reach
desc: An Association of young adults, Chartered under Rotary International District 3291,sponsored by Rotary Garden Reach. Dedicated to serve the community.

name: Central Gardens Calcutta
desc:
Rotaract Club of Central Gardens Calcutta 3291, sponsored by Rotary Club of Central Gardens Calcutta RID 3291.
Our aim is to serve the society with the help of the youths ageing above 18.

name: Calcutta Mega City
desc: Our Club is based on community service

name: Salt Lake City Calcutta
desc:
Formed in the Year of the Game Changers, our club believes in PUTTING PEOPLE FIRST and aspires to SERVE TO CHANGE LIVES. 
Our club is primarily based in Salt Lake City but has members who reside outside Kolkata, as well! We have started this journey with 24 active members, and we wish to see our small family grow into a big circle of philanthropist souls. We prioritize each of the four avenues of the Movement and wish to work in all these spheres of service with utmost dedication and sincerity. 
With aspirations and goals to achieve, our club believes and aims at BEING THE CHANGE!

name: Calcutta Circle
desc: Rotaract club of Calcutta Circle bring together people ages 18 and older belonging to different sphere of life to exchange ideas with leaders in the community, develop leadership and professional skills, and have fun through service. Our main motive is to bring a revolution through change in the society and within ourself.
